availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James P. Lyddane (Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married to Abigail W. Whitecomb Lyddane in Marion County, Ohio, on January 14, 1852. Wool manufacturer in Clark County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Clark County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p. 832.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Clark County, KY, June & July 1863, p. 132.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Marion County Marriages, Film 000384239, p. 54.
